# Immune system

|            | Innate immunity | Adaptive immunity             |
|------------|-----------------|-------------------------------|
| *response* | non-specific    | pathogen and antigen specific |
| *exposure* | immediate       | lag time                      |
| *memory*   | no              | yes                           |
| *present*  | all life forms  | only jawed vertebrates        |

## *Disorders of human immunity*

```         
- Immunodeficiency
- Autoimmunity
- Hypersensitivity
- Idiopathic inflammation
```

```{r echo=FALSE, , echo=TRUE}

5-2
```

## Hypersensitivity types

1.  Type I allergy antigens
2.  Type II cellular dysfunction by antibodies
3.  Type III abnormal immune response by antibodies
4.  Type IV T cell-mediated
